Control: Assignment: organization-defined types of system components a.Authorize and control [] entering and exiting the facility; and b.Maintain records of the system components.
Discussion: Enforcing authorizations for entry and exit of system components may require restricting access to delivery areas and isolating the areas from the system and media libraries.
RelatedControls: CM-3, CM-8, MA-2, MA-3, MP-5, PE-20, SR-2, SR-3, SR-4, SR-6
